stheno.matrix module¶

stheno.matrix.matrix[source]¶

Matrix as Dense.

Parameters

a (tensor) – Matrix to type.

Matrix as Dense.

Return type

matrix.Dense

class stheno.matrix.Dense(mat)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.field.Element, plum.resolvable.Referentiable

Symmetric positive-definite matrix.

Parameters

mat (tensor) – Symmetric positive-definite matrix.

T¶
class stheno.matrix.LowRank(left, right=None, middle=None)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.matrix.Dense, plum.resolvable.Referentiable

Low-rank symmetric positive-definite matrix.

The low-rank matrix is constructed via left diag(scales) transpose(right).

Parameters

  • left (tensor) – Left part of the matrix.

  • right (tensor, optional) – Right part of the matrix. Defaults to left.

  • scales (tensor, optional) – Scaling of the outer products. Defaults to ones.

class stheno.matrix.Diagonal(diag, rows=None, cols=None)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.matrix.Dense, plum.resolvable.Referentiable

Diagonal symmetric positive-definite matrix.

Parameters

  • diag (vector) – Diagonal of the matrix.

  • rows (scalar, optional) – Number of rows. Defaults to the length of the diagonal.

  • cols (scalar, optional) – Number of columns. Defaults to the number of rows.

class stheno.matrix.UniformlyDiagonal(diag_scale, n, rows=None, cols=None)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.matrix.Diagonal, plum.resolvable.Referentiable

Uniformly diagonal symmetric positive-definite matrix.

Parameters

  • diag_scale (scalar) – Scale of the diagonal of the matrix.

  • n (int) – Length of the diagonal.

  • rows (scalar, optional) – Number of rows. Defaults to the length of the diagonal.

  • cols (scalar, optional) – Number of columns. Defaults to the number of rows.

  • cols (scalar, optional) – Number of columns. Defaults to the number of rows.

class stheno.matrix.Woodbury(diag, lr, lr_pd=True)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.matrix.Dense, plum.resolvable.Referentiable

Sum of a low-rank and diagonal symmetric positive-definite matrix.

Parameters

  • diag (matrix.Diagonal) – Diagonal part.

  • lr (matrix.LowRank) – Low-rank part.

  • lr_pd (bool, optional) – Specify that the low-rank part is PD. Defaults to True.

class stheno.matrix.Constant(constant, rows, cols=None)[source]¶

Bases: stheno.matrix.LowRank, plum.resolvable.Referentiable

Constant symmetric positive-definite matrix.

Parameters

  • constant (scalar) – Constant of the matrix.

  • rows (scalar) – Number of rows.

  • cols (scalar, optional) – Number of columns. Defaults to the number of rows.
